bibl.title: Apokrimata. Decisions of Septimius Severus on Legal Matters. (Columbia Bicentennial Editions and Studies.)

New York, Columbia University Press, 1954, 4Â°, x-111 pp. et 1 pl.

C.R. par Vincenzo Arangio-Ruiz, Gnomon 28 (1956) pp. 186-192. - A.R. Bellinger, CP 51 (1956) pp. 179-180. - A.E.R. Boak, AHR 60 (1955) pp. 937-938. - D. Daube JRS 48 (1958) p. 234. - Martin David, Mnemosyne 4a s., 11 (1958) pp. 84-85. - P. de Francisci, Iura 6 (1955) pp. 184-188. - Albert Deman, Latomus 15 (1956) pp. 102-103. - Alvaro d'Ors, Emerita 24 (1956) pp. 417-425. - Jean Gaudemet, RD 4e s., 33 (1955) pp. 475-481. - A.H.M.
